content.query:
create or alter view ecevents
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/ecevents',
        data_source = 'mct',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [ecevents];

create or alter view move_history
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/moves',
        data_source = 'mct',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [move_history];
